oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cow Brand Soda
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Thompson Brothers
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "Cow Brand Soda" "We Come to Stay" advertising wagon with horses and men in white aprons or suits nearby. Poster for Davis and Keough's The Hustler at Staub's Theatre. in background. Copy photograph.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Soda industry; Carts & wagons; Advertisements; Group portraits; African Americans; Horses;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: To use photographs or to order reproductions, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8808. Please refer to Image Number and provide a brief description of the photograph.
